chat_history.message: Hello, My product is an iPhone 12 Pro with the above issue: The package is being returned to the sender, so I would like a refund. Thank you for your help,

Dear ecomobile

The parcel will be returned to you.

Customer requests a refund.

Thank you

Regards,
Gurcan from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We await the arrival of the parcel.

Regards,
JY

Dear Backcare,

We have processed the refund.

Regards,
JH
